reference: Chetty, Raj and Saez, Emmanuel. Dividend Taxes and Corporate Behavior: Evidence from the 2003 Dividend Tax Cut. Quarterly Journal of Economics, 2005, 120(3), pp. 79 1-833.
Auerbach, Alan J. and Hassett, Kevin A. The 2003 Dividend Tax Cuts and the Value of the Firm. NBER Working Paper 11449, July 2005.
Amromin, Gene, Hanison, Paul and Sharpe, Steve. How Did the 2003 Dividend Tax Cut Affect Stock Prices? Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, December 2005.
